net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.algorithm.tan

Class TanClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.base.RuleBase
      • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.crisprule.CrispRuleBase
        • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.algorithm.tan.TanClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, IClassifier

    public class TanClassifier
extends CrispRuleBase
    Classifier for Tan et al. 2002 - Mining multiple comprehensible classification rules using genetic programming

    The Tan et al. algorithm states that the rules within the classifier must be sorted according to their specificity value. This procedure is carried out in the sortClassifier() method.

    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura, Jose M. Luna, Alberto Cano, Juan Luis Olmo
    See Also:
